        private String doOCR(File input,
                     Tess4JParserConfig config)
              throws IOException,
                     org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
        Run Tess4J OCR instance
        Parameters:
        input - the File to be OCRed
        config - the Configuration for tesseract-ocr
        Throws:

      • extractOutput

        private void extractOutput(Reader reader,
                           org.apache.tika.sax.XHTMLContentHandler xhtml)
                    throws SAXException,
                           IOException
        Reads the contents of the given stream and write it to the given XHTML content handler. The stream is closed once fully processed.
        Parameters:
        reader - Reader where is the result of ocr
        xhtml - XHTML content handler
        Throws:
        SAXException - if the XHTML SAX events could not be handled
        IOException - if an input error occurred
